analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika upa ādinna duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ ca

original: Hetuyā cha, sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha

original: Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa na anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, kamme cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava anantare samanantare tīṇi upanissaye purejāte nava kamme cha atthiyā nava natthiyā vigate tīṇi avigate nava
